subject: Soccer
Domestic Violence
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s team goalkeeper Hope Solo was combative with officers after her arrest last year on accusations that she assaulted her half sister and her teenage nephew, according to an ESPN report.
snippet: The United States women’s team goalkeeper Hope Solo was combative with officers after her arrest last year on accusations that she assaulted her half sister and her teenage nephew, according to an ESPN report.
